scripts.say: Enemy Mass-Produced fleets are running rampant everywhere in the ocean!
With their leader out of the picture, they no longer pose a threat, and your fleet can automatically destroy them when in a tile adjacent to them!
Additionally, you can acquire Cleanup Points by destroying these fleets! You will then be rewarded with an amount of Queen's Medals based on how many Cleanup Points you get!
However, you don't have much time, so your fleet can only make 3 moves in total...
So get close to the biggest groups of enemies you can and make the most of your moves!
